mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO,FREE_TITLE AS TITLE,F_CREATE_DATE AS CDATE,'free' AS SORT FROM FREE_TBL WHERE FREE_WRITER = 'mbk1991' UNION ALL SELECT PLANNER_NO,PLANNER_TITLE,P_CREATE_DATE,'planner' FROM PLANNER_TBL WHERE PLANNER_WRITER = 'mbk1991' UNION ALL SELECT BOARD_NO,REVIEW_TITLE,R_CREATE_DATE,'review' FROM REVIEW_TBL WHERE REVIEW_WRITER ='mbk1991' UNION ALL SELECT BOARD_NO,TRADE_TITLE,T_CREATE_DATE,'trade' FROM TRADE_TBL WHERE TRADE_WRITER ='mbk1991' UNION ALL SELECT BOARD_NO,PARTY_TITLE,P_CREATE_DATE,'party' FROM PARTY_TBL WHERE PARTY_WRITER = 'mbk1991' ORDER BY 3 DESC
